articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: JPMorgan, Bank of America to crack down on long work hours after death of Leo Lukenas — who logged 100 hours per week - New York Post

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: General Mills sells North America yogurt operations in $2 billion deal - Reuters.com
articles.description: General Mills will sell its North America yogurt business to French dairy firms Groupe Lactalis and Sodiaal in a $2.1 billion deal, the Cheerios maker said on Thursday.
